column1: # refer to blueprint on suitable options for filesize
# name : network file name that file will be created into
# address : this is the network address the file can be downloaded from - the file must be uploaded as PUBLIC
# md5 : Optional - this is the MD5 hash of the file - this is used to validate the recevied file independantly
#    tiny = files with a size below 128k
#    small = files with a size of 129k > 4Mb
#    medium = files with a size of 4Mb > 32MB
#    large = files with a size of 32MB > 60MB
#    huge = files with a size of 128MB > 1G
#    giga = files with a size of 1G > 20G
#    tera = files with a size of 20G > 100G
